mapper.select: SELECT id FROM chatRoom INNER JOIN chatUser ON chatRoom.id = chatUser.chatRoomId WHERE chatUser.userEmail = #{email} AND chatRoom.roomStatus = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT chatMessage.chatRoomId AS id, chatMessage.message, b.maxSendAt AS sendAt FROM chatMessage INNER JOIN (SELECT chatRoomId, MAX(sendAt) AS maxSendAt FROM chatMessage WHERE chatRoomId IN (SELECT chatUser.chatRoomId FROM chatUser WHERE chatUser.userEmail = 'aaaa') GROUP BY chatRoomId) AS b ON chatMessage.chatRoomId = b.chatRoomId INNER JOIN chatRoom ON chatMessage.chatRoomId = chatRoom.id WHERE chatMessage.sendAt = b.maxSendAt AND chatRoom.roomStatus = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY maxSendAt DESC;
